name: Catch Evolve
description:
Catch Evolve is a 2D game where you need to catch as many objects as you can in a limited time and use earned points to buy new evolutions to unlock new levels and get the highest score possible. 

***FEATURES***
  • Three different evolutions to unlock!
  • Four different levels to enjoy!
  • Buy more time to get higher score!

I'd be glad to get some feedback and constructive criticism since it's my first game.
